alert.note: Alert for Eastern Rensselaer; Schoharie; Western Albany; Western Greene; Western Schenectady (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 03 at 9:08PM EST until March 04 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches with up to 12 inches in the higher terrain areas. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...In Massachusetts, Northern Berkshire County. In New York, Schoharie, Western Schenectady, Western Albany and Eastern Rensselaer Counties. * WHEN...Through 7 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult due to snow covered roadways and reduced visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow rates will likely reach one to even near two inches per hour at times tonight. The combination of strong winds and the weight of the snow may lead to downed tree branches resulting in some power outages.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Rensselaer; Schoharie; Western Albany; Western Greene; Western Schenectady
